message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll find it's worth the investment. I'm willing to let it go for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'm prepared to offer $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $14,000. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
Alice, I'm really interested in your product, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. I think this is a fair compromise that gives us both a good deal.
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. This is as close to my minimum as I'm willing to go.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm prepared to offer $11,500. This is a good middle ground, and I'm confident we can finalize the deal.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $12,500, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. This is my final compromise.
